solution_line_template: If Charley bought {initial_pencils} pencils and lost {lost_moving} while moving, she remained with {initial_pencils}-{lost_moving}=<<{initial_pencils}-{lost_moving}={pencils_after_moving}>>{pencils_after_moving} pencils.

Because she isn't good at keeping track of her pencils, Charley lost {fraction_lost_remaining}*{pencils_after_moving} = <<{fraction_lost_remaining}*{pencils_after_moving}={lost_remaining}>>{lost_remaining} more pencils.
